mapper.insert: INSERT INTO selab_attendance_log( att_user, att_start_time ) VALUE (#{userName},#{attStartTime})
mapper.select: select id, att_user, att_start_time, att_end_time, `interval` from selab_attendance_log where att_user = #{userName} and id = (select MAX(id) From selab_attendance_log);
mapper.update: UPDATE selab_attendance_log AS a, (SELECT MAX(id) AS id, att_user, att_start_time, att_end_time, `interval` FROM selab_attendance_log WHERE att_user = #{userName}) AS b SET a.att_end_time = #{attEndTime},a.interval = #{interval} WHERE a.id = b.id
